lines.text: I've got to pee. Okay with you?
There's no need to leave. Do it here.
Inside of Sada, all nice and warm.
You're mad! It's impossible to do both at the same time.
Now what am I supposed to do?
You mustn't ask me. Aren't you the bride?
But how should I know? I've never been married before.
You want to make love all the time, huh?
You don't think it's wrong, do you?
I think it's wonderful. You're beautiful.
I was afraid of not being like others. I was so worried about it, I even went to see a doctor. He said I was sensitive where sex was concerned.
Sensitive? I hope it's incurable. Because I adore your oversensitivity.

[talking to Sada]
A girl like you can stab a man's heart without a knife, huh?
